kulami.control

Class MapEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.control.MapEditorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapEditorAdapter

    public class MapEditorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapEditorAdapter
    This class is a controller for the MapEditor class.

    A MapEditor uses a MapEditorController object to handle user input events. User input events are encapsulated by the MapEditorAdapter interface, which MapEditor implements.

    Author:
    gordon
